info.title: Koupii LMS API
info.description: API documentation for English course LMS

post.description: Registers a user and logs them in

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

post.description: Authenticates a user using email and password. Requires X-XSRF-TOKEN header if using Sanctum with session-based auth.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

post.description: Invalidates the session and logs out the user. Requires X-XSRF-TOKEN header if using session-based Sanctum.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile data. Requires CSRF token in session-based Sanctum.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

get.summary: Get CSRF token cookie for Sanctum
get.description: This endpoint sets the XSRF-TOKEN cookie required for CSRF protection in session-based auth. Usually called before login.
Returns a list of all vocabulary categories.
